mapper.sql: SELECT p.pno, p.lqno,lc.lqclass,m.mno, p.ptype,p.plike,p.phate,p.pdetail,l.lname,ifnull(e.perror,0) as perror FROM problem AS p JOIN member AS m ON p.mno=m.mno join licenseclass as lc on p.lqno=lc.lqno join license as l on lc.lno=l.lno left outer JOIN (select pno,COUNT(*) AS perror from error GROUP BY pno) AS e ON e.pno=p.pno
select count(*) from problem as p
inner JOIN interest AS i ON i.pno=p.pno
